verses.verse: בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> In the third לְצֵ֥את <WH3318> were gone forth בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> the same day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> they בָּ֖אוּ <WH935> came מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> they [into] the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> of Sinai

וַיִּסְע֣וּ <WH5265> For they were departed מֵרְפִידִ֗ים <WH7508> from Rephidim וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and were come מִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> [to] the desert סִינַ֔י <WH5514> of Sinai וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> and had pitched בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וַיִּֽחַן־ <WH2583> camped שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> and there יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and there Israel נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> front הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> before the mount

וּמֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> And Moses עָלָ֖ה <WH5927> went up אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> unto God וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אֵלָ֤יו <WH413> and to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָ֣ר <WH2022> unto him out of the mountain לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus תֹאמַר֙ <WH559> Thus shalt thou say לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> to the house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְתַגֵּ֖יד <WH5046> and tell לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you רְאִיתֶ֔ם <WH7200> Ye have seen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> what I did לְמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> and [how] I bare אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> and כַּנְפֵ֣י <WH3671> wings נְשָׁרִ֔ים <WH5404> you on eagles' וָאָבִ֥א <WH935> and brought אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now אִם־ <WH518> if שָׁמ֤וֹעַ <WH8085> Now therefore if ye will obey תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> indeed בְּקֹלִ֔י <WH6963> my voice וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH8104> and keep אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֑י <WH1285> my covenant וִהְיִ֨יתֶם <WH1961> become לִ֤י סְגֻלָּה֙ <WH5459> then ye shall be a peculiar treasure מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> unto me above all people כִּי־ <WH3588> for לִ֖י כָּל־ <WH3605> for all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> for all the earth

וְאַתֶּ֧ם <WH859> you תִּהְיוּ־ <WH1961> become לִ֛י מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <WH4467> And ye shall be unto me a kingdom כֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> of priests וְג֣וֹי <WH1471> nation קָד֑וֹשׁ <WH6918> and an holy אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> another הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> These [are] the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you תְּדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> which thou shalt speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses וַיִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> and called לְזִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> for the elders הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <WH7760> and laid לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6440> before their faces אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֖הוּ <WH6680> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> which the LORD

וַיַּעֲנ֨וּ <WH6030> answered כָל־ <WH3605> All הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> And all the people יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> together וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> All אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> All that the LORD נַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> we will do וַיָּ֧שֶׁב <WH7725> returned מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I בָּ֣א <WH935> Lo I come אֵלֶיךָ֮ <WH413> unto בְּעַ֣ב <WH5645> unto thee in a thick הֶֽעָנָן֒ <WH6051> cloud בַּעֲב֞וּר <WH5668> so יִשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> may hear הָעָם֙ <WH5971> that the people בְּדַבְּרִ֣י <WH1696> when I speak עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> you וְגַם־ <WH1571> and may also בְּךָ֖ יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <WH539> with thee and believe לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> thee for ever וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <WH5046> told מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> unto Moses לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> unto the people וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ם <WH6942> and sanctify הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> them to day וּמָחָ֑ר <WH4279> and to morrow וְכִבְּס֖וּ <WH3526> and let them wash שִׂמְלֹתָֽם׃ <WH8071> their clothes

וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become נְכֹנִ֖ים <WH3559> And be ready לַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> against the third כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <WH7992> for the third יֵרֵ֧ד <WH3381> will come down יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD לְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight כָל־ <WH3605> of all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of all the people עַל־ <WH5921> on הַ֥ר <WH2022> upon mount סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> Sinai

וְהִגְבַּלְתָּ֤ <WH1379> And thou shalt set bounds אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֙ <WH5971> unto the people סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> round about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הִשָּׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> Take heed לָכֶ֛ם עֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> to yourselves [that ye] go [not] up בָּהָ֖ר <WH2022> into the mount וּנְגֹ֣עַ <WH5060> or touch בְּקָצֵ֑הוּ <WH7097> the border כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <WH5060> of it whosoever toucheth בָּהָ֖ר <WH2022> the mount מ֥וֹת <WH4191> shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> put to death

לֹא־ <WH3808> No תִגַּ֨ע <WH5060> touch בּ֜וֹ יָ֗ד <WH3027> There shall not an hand כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for סָק֤וֹל <WH5619> it but he shall surely יִסָּקֵל֙ <WH5619> be stoned אוֹ־ <WH176> or יָרֹ֣ה <WH3384> shot יִיָּרֶ֔ה <WH3384> through אִם־ <WH518> or בְּהֵמָ֥ה <WH929> whether [it be] beast אִם־ <WH518> or אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> man לֹ֣א <WH3808> No יִחְיֶ֑ה <WH2421> it shall not live בִּמְשֹׁךְ֙ <WH4900> soundeth long הַיֹּבֵ֔ל <WH3104> when the trumpet הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they יַעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> they shall come up בָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> to the mount

וַיֵּ֧רֶד <WH3381> went down מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses מִן־ <WH4480> from הָהָ֖ר <WH2022> from the mount אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> unto the people וַיְקַדֵּשׁ֙ <WH6942> and sanctified אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people וַֽיְכַבְּס֖וּ <WH3526> and they washed שִׂמְלֹתָֽם׃ <WH8071> their clothes

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> unto the people הֱי֥וּ <WH1961> Be נְכֹנִ֖ים <WH3559> ready לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> against the third יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> day אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּגְּשׁ֖וּ <WH5066> come אֶל־ <WH413> about אִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> not at [your] wives

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> came בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֜י <WH7992> And it came to pass on the third בִּֽהְיֹ֣ת <WH1961> came הַבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> came קֹלֹ֨ת <WH6963> that there were thunders וּבְרָקִ֜ים <WH1300> and lightnings וְעָנָ֤ן <WH6051> cloud כָּבֵד֙ <WH3515> and a thick עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> upon the mount וְקֹ֥ל <WH6963> and the voice שֹׁפָ֖ר <WH7782> of the trumpet חָזָ֣ק <WH2389> loud מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> exceeding וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <WH2729> trembled כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> so that all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> that [was] in the camp

וַיּוֹצֵ֨א <WH3318> brought forth מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> the people לִקְרַ֥את <WH7125> to meet הָֽאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> with God מִן־ <WH4480> out הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> out of the camp וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <WH3320> and they stood בְּתַחְתִּ֥ית <WH8482> at the nether הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> part of the mount

וְהַ֤ר <WH2022> And mount סִינַי֙ <WH5514> Sinai עָשַׁ֣ן <WH6225> was altogether on a smoke כֻּלּ֔וֹ <WH3605> all מִ֠פְּנֵי <WH6440> accept אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יָרַ֥ד <WH3381> descended עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> upon it in fire וַיַּ֤עַל <WH5927> thereof ascended עֲשָׁנוֹ֙ <WH6227> and the smoke כְּעֶ֣שֶׁן <WH6227> as the smoke הַכִּבְשָׁ֔ן <WH3536> of a furnace וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <WH2729> quaked כָּל־ <WH3605> and the whole הָהָ֖ר <WH2022> and the whole mount מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> greatly

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become ק֣וֹל <WH6963> And when the voice הַשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> of the trumpet הוֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> long וְחָזֵ֣ק <WH2390> and waxed louder מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and louder מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> Moses יְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> spake וְהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and God יַעֲנֶ֥נּוּ <WH6030> answered בְקֽוֹל׃ <WH6963> sounded

וַיֵּ֧רֶד <WH3381> came down יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> on הַ֥ר <WH2022> upon mount סִינַ֖י <WH5514> Sinai אֶל־ <WH413> [up] to רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> on the top הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> of the mount וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> and the LORD לְמֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> the top הָהָ֖ר <WH2022> of the mount וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> went up מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> and Moses

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses רֵ֖ד <WH3381> Go down הָעֵ֣ד <WH5749> charge בָּעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people פֶּן־ <WH6435> so יֶהֶרְס֤וּ <WH2040> lest they break through אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD לִרְא֔וֹת <WH7200> to gaze וְנָפַ֥ל <WH5307> of them perish מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at רָֽב׃ <WH7227> and many

וְגַ֧ם <WH1571> Also הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> And let the priests הַנִּגָּשִׁ֥ים <WH5066> also which come near אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> to the LORD יִתְקַדָּ֑שׁוּ <WH6942> sanctify פֶּן־ <WH6435> or יִפְרֹ֥ץ <WH6555> break forth בָּהֶ֖ם יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> themselves lest the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> not יוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> cannot הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> The people לַעֲלֹ֖ת <WH5927> come up אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֣ר <WH2022> to mount סִינָ֑י <WH5514> Sinai כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֞ה <WH859> You הַעֵדֹ֤תָה <WH5749> for thou chargedst בָּ֙נוּ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> us saying הַגְבֵּ֥ל <WH1379> Set bounds אֶת־ <WH853> הָהָ֖ר <WH2022> about the mount וְקִדַּשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH6942> and sanctify

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֤יו <WH413> then יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD לֶךְ־ <WH1980> down רֵ֔ד <WH3381> get thee down וְעָלִ֥יתָ <WH5927> and thou shalt come up אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> up you וְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> thou and Aaron עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> let וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> with thee but let not the priests וְהָעָ֗ם <WH5971> and the people אַל־ <WH408> nay יֶֽהֶרְס֛וּ <WH2040> break through לַעֲלֹ֥ת <WH5927> to come up אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD פֶּן־ <WH6435> or יִפְרָץ־ <WH6555> lest he break forth בָּֽם׃
וַיֵּ֥רֶד <WH3381> went down מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> So Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> unto the people וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and spake אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about ס
